title: News: The Shins Announce New Album
body:
**The Shins** have just announced details of their fourth studio album and their first since 2007’s _**Wincing The Night Away**_.

_**Port Of Morrow**_ will be released in March 2012, via Columbia, and sees **James Mercer** taking on an even more prominent role, with him writing all the songs and playing most of the instruments on the record. New music from **The Shins** is expected in January.

Produced by **Greg Kurstin**, a full tour in support of the record is expected to be announced soon, and you can be the first to hear new music from **The Shins** by signing up to their [mailing list](http://www.theshins.com/). An exact release date for _**Port Of Morrow**_ will be announced soon.
